name: Tiamat
domains: Destruction, Dragon, Evil, Greed, Hatred, Law, Scalykind, Trickery, Tyranny
interfaithblessing: +1 on attack rolls and damage rolls
worshippers: Tiamat is worshiped by evil dragons and those that serve and admire them.
appearance: Tiamat is a 5-headed dragon with one head each of a red dragon, black dragon, blue dragon, white dragon, and green dragon.
dogma: As the God of Evil Dragons Tiamat stands in opposition to Bahamut in all things. She concerns herself with spreading evil through conquest, destruction, and plots. She seeks to extend the powers of evil dragons throughout the land.
clergy: Tiamat has few clerics, but those she has seek to extend the power of evil dragons.
